dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) TSYSDATE, initcap(:P_MONTH1)||' '||:P_YEAR1 || ' - ' || initcap(:P_MONTH2)||' '||:P_YEAR2 P_MON FROM SYS.DUAL

SELECT SUM(ftpd.text_value) Cost FROM ff_text_profile ftp, ff_text_profile_d ftpd WHERE ftp.ff_text_profile_gid = ftpd.ff_text_profile_gid AND (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ftp.ff_text_profile_xid,1,INSTR(ftp.ff_text_profile_xid,'20')-1) || '-1-' || SUBSTR(ftp.ff_text_profile_xid,-4),'month-dd-yyyy') >= TO_DATE(UPPER(:P_MONTH1)|| '-1-' || :P_YEAR1,'month-dd-yyyy') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ftp.ff_text_profile_xid,1,INSTR(ftp.ff_text_profile_xid,'20')-1) || '-1-' || SUBSTR(ftp.ff_text_profile_xid,-4),'month-dd-yyyy') < TO_DATE(UPPER(:P_MONTH2)|| '-1-' || :P_YEAR2,'month-dd-yyyy') + INTERVAL '1' month(1))

SELECT NVL(SUM(Labor_Total_T),0) labor_total_cost FROM (SELECT (COUNT (shipment_gid) * (SELECT labor_units FROM glogowner.labor_units WHERE provider_type = main_tab.transport_mode AND mode1 = main_tab.truck_type)) Labor_Total_T FROM (SELECT sh.insert_user username, DECODE ((SELECT loc.province FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid), 'Alaska', 'Alaska', DECODE ((SELECT loc.country_code3_gid FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid), (SELECT loc.country_code3_gid FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.dest_location_gid), 'DOMESTIC','INTERNATIONAL')) transaction_type, trm.transport_mode_xid transport_mode, equi_group.equipment_group_xid truck_type, sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh, transport_mode trm, shipment_s_equipment_join shsejn, equipment_group equi_group, s_equipment seq WHERE 1 = 1 AND (sh.insert_date >= TO_DATE(UPPER(:P_MONTH1)|| '-1-' || :P_YEAR1,'month-dd-yyyy') AND sh.insert_date < TO_DATE(UPPER(:P_MONTH2)|| '-1-' || :P_YEAR2,'month-dd-yyyy') + INTERVAL '1' month(1)) AND trm.transport_mode_gid = sh.transport_mode_gid AND shsejn.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND seq.s_equipment_gid = shsejn.s_equipment_gid AND seq.equipment_group_gid = equi_group.equipment_group_gid) main_tab GROUP BY username, transaction_type, transport_mode, truck_type)

SELECT main_tab.username, main_tab.transaction_type, main_tab.transport_mode, main_tab.truck_type, COUNT (main_tab.shipment_gid) NoOfLoads, NVL((SELECT labor_units FROM glogowner.labor_units WHERE provider_type = main_tab.transport_mode AND mode1 = main_tab.truck_type),0) Labor_units, (COUNT (shipment_gid) * NVL((SELECT labor_units FROM glogowner.labor_units WHERE provider_type = main_tab.transport_mode AND mode1 = main_tab.truck_type),0)) Labor_Total_T, :Labor_Total_cost tl_cost, :cost cost1 FROM (SELECT sh.insert_user username, DECODE ((SELECT loc.province FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid), 'Alaska', 'Alaska', DECODE ((SELECT loc.country_code3_gid FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid), (SELECT loc.country_code3_gid FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.dest_location_gid), 'DOMESTIC','INTERNATIONAL')) transaction_type, trm.transport_mode_xid transport_mode, equi_group.equipment_group_xid truck_type, sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh, transport_mode trm, shipment_s_equipment_join shsejn, equipment_group equi_group, s_equipment seq WHERE 1 = 1 AND (sh.insert_date >= TO_DATE(UPPER(:P_MONTH1)|| '-1-' || :P_YEAR1,'month-dd-yyyy') AND sh.insert_date < TO_DATE(UPPER(:P_MONTH2)|| '-1-' || :P_YEAR2,'month-dd-yyyy') + INTERVAL '1' month(1)) AND trm.transport_mode_gid = sh.transport_mode_gid AND shsejn.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND seq.s_equipment_gid = shsejn.s_equipment_gid AND seq.equipment_group_gid = equi_group.equipment_group_gid) main_tab GROUP BY username, transaction_type, transport_mode, truck_type
select trim(to_char(sysdate,'FMDay,Month DD, yyyy ')) CURR_DATE from dual
